text1.text: You can make an appointment or ask any question using our:

text2.text: Or, if you prefer, you can call us directly during our working hours or leave a voice message here:

heroHeader.tagLine: Your dentists in Las Palmas de G.C.
heroHeader.address: Avenida Mesa y L贸pez 1, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria

slide1.h3: White teeth, healthy mouth and happy smile.
slide1.p: This dental treatment allows you to correct alterations in tooth colour. The mouth is one of the parts of the body that most reflects personality and says the most about a person. Having a healthy smile and white teeth is a desire we all share. Therefore, to show your best version, don't hesitate to get the best dental whitening with Blancodent, your dentist in Las Palmas.

slide2.h3: There are no more excuses not to smile.
slide2.p: Orthodontics allows you to correct the bad positioning of teeth. It is much more than an aesthetic solution, more than a simple alignment of teeth. It achieves a healthy life for teeth, gums and correct bite, thus providing wellbeing for your mouth.

slide3.p: We use the latest technology to provide you with dental implant placement with virtually no surgery, discomfort or pain, recovering the function and aesthetics of your mouth. In addition, we have innovative technology where we can use the biomaterial obtained from the patient's own extracted tooth, in order to provide almost perfect osseointegration.

slide4.h3: If you feel inflamation or bleeding.
slide4.p: Between 85-90% of the population over 35 years of age suffers from these pathologies to some degree, mainly gingivitis. In addition, they affect dental and general health, increase cardiovascular risk, complicate diabetes, increase the risk of premature birth, etc.

slide5.h3: The objective is to restore the affected tooth.
slide5.p: The treatment of dental caries with dental fillings is a very common and simple procedure. After removing the affected dental tissue, the dental cavity is cleaned and filled with esthetic and dental biomaterials.

slide6.h3: Carrying out a correct dental cleaning you can achive a helthy denture.
slide6.p: Dental hygiene, without a doubt, begins with the usual dental brush and toothpaste, although it should not end here. Most of us should use additional methods: dental floss, interdental brush, oral irrigator, mouthwashes... As well as visiting a Dentist nearby in Las Palmas and having a dental cleaning every 6 months.

first.title: This is who we are
first.content: We are a professional partnership founded and managed by registered dentists. Behind the registered trademark 'blancodent' there is no owner or employee outside the dental or medical profession. This guarantees you a professional level in the quality of our services, in the materials used in the clinic and in compliance with health procedures.

second.title: What makes us different?
second.content: Is it because we do not mix economic interests with the medical profession, or is it because we do not join with large ondontological franchises that exist in the market? Our patients tell us that these are two reasons why they like us. But there are so many more. Do you want to discover them?

card1.title: The staff
card1.content: There's nothing better than a good photo, is there? We're lucky to have a very cool photographer in the family (he's the same one who made this website and the drawings) and we take advantage of him a little bit (hehe). Well... we're not exactly magazine cover material. But anyway, here you can see us: The staff, prepared, friendly and attentive.
card1.alt: Two women embracing, smiling at the camera

card2.title: The images
card2.content: Modern, warm environment tailored to the client's comfort. Also videos of the clinic. So you can see how we care for our environment where we work every day. And we don't do it just for ourselves, but also so that you feel comfortable when you visit us.
card2.alt: Clinic waiting room, three chairs in a row

card3.title: Opening hours
card3.content: Our opening hours, adjusted for you: On MONDAYS, WEDNESDAYS and FRIDAYS we open at these times: 09:30 - 16:00 in the morning. On TUESDAYS and THURSDAYS we open in the afternoon: 14:00 - 20:00. At weekends we dedicate ourselves to our families.

card4.title: Location
card4.content: We've pinned our little arrow on the Google map so you can see where we are, as we're located on the recently pedestrianised and one of the most emblematic streets of our beautiful city: Av. Mesa y L贸pez, 1 - 1st left. 35006 Las Palmas de G.C. And don't forget to come back afterwards. Seriously...
card4.alt: Woman looking at a map to find her way

card5.title: Transport
card5.content: There are plenty of car parks and bus stops nearby. There are also taxi ranks in the area. In fact, one bus has its stop right in front of the clinic. I don't know if you'll be travelling on this particular bus, but we like to say it out loud.
card5.alt: A bicycle leaning against the wall

card6.title: Financing
card6.content: We'd like to help everyone a bit but, as we're not a bank, we've signed agreements with others who are. Give it a try, it's free to get a quote and a check-up at Blancodent and to apply for an online loan with our finance companies.
card6.alt: A hand holding a phone whilst making a payment at a payment terminal

card1.title: Implantology
card1.content: Permanently recover the function and aesthetics of your teeth, implanting small pieces of metal, and you can live without problems as if it were your own teeth. At Blancodent, your dentist clinic we use the latest German technology to provide you with implant placement with virtually no surgery, discomfort or pain.
card1.alt: Cross-sectional model of jawbone with a tooth replaced by an implant

card2.title: Orthodontics
card2.content: Orthodontics is the dental treatment aimed at correcting incorrectly positioned teeth. When the teeth are not aligned and as a result, they do not bite correctly between them, they cause difficulty in keeping them clean, there is a risk of early loss, paradontosis problems and can cause headaches. Finally, they cause an unwanted aesthetic appearance.
card2.alt: Young woman with a wide smile showing orthodontic braces

card3.title: Periodontology
card3.content: If you feel inflammation or bleeding gums, this is the rental treatments that interests you. The culprit is always bacteria. There are many solutions, both on our part and yours. For an impeccable dental care of your gums, we recommend you review the way to take care of your dental hygiene. There are additional ways to maintain hygiene, and we will inform you of these if you visit us.

card4.title: Dental Whitening
card4.content: Dental whitening is a simple and painless dental treatment designed to correct the colour of your teeth. It is based on the use of natural products that work through oxidation. This whitening will not cause you any discomfort or pain. Only one session at the dental clinic is required. We will then provide you with a dental whitening kit to reinforce the treatment at home; in two weeks you will have white teeth as you imagined.
card4.alt: Young man with beard and glasses smiling

card5.title: Bruxism
card5.content: The medical term for teeth grinding is bruxism. Our teeth are not designed to withstand this constant force and abrasion. Bruxism is classified as a parafunctional activity, which refers to the use of any part of the body in a way that is not usual. The causes of bruxism are very complex and most experts agree that multiple factors can lead to or contribute to bruxism. At Blancodent Dental Clinic we advise you that if you suffer from bruxism or teeth grinding, visit us to try to resolve it.
card5.alt: Smiling mouth of a woman, showing a transparent bite guard

card6.title: Conservative Dentistry
card6.content: Conservative dentistry is a dental treatment that aims to preserve the patient's natural teeth. Thanks to aesthetic materials, such as composites, lost dental tissue can be replaced, whether due to cavities or fractures. The treatment of cavities through fillings is a very common and simple procedure. After removing the affected dental tissue, the dental cavity is cleaned and filled with biocompatible (aesthetic) materials. The objective is to restore the affected tooth to restore perfect chewing.

card7.title: Endodontics
card7.content: Endodontics is a dental treatment that involves the removal of the patient's nerve. If a small cavity is not discovered in time and is not treated (something easily avoidable if you attend a six-monthly check-up), it can deepen enough to reach and infect the living part of the tooth. At that point, pain and inflammation arrive. If it is not too late, we will try to save your tooth by treating the infection, before resorting to tooth extraction and the high costs resulting from prostheses or dental implants.
card7.alt: A digital X-ray image of several teeth

card8.title: Dental Prostheses
card8.content: Dental prostheses remain a reliable solution in cases where either a dental implant is not possible or as an economical alternative. Technological progress also advances in this practical solution because it is still used today just as in the decades following implantology. So there are various options, more or less comfortable or economical depending on your case.
card8.alt: Plaster model of a jaw and teeth

card9.title: Dental Hygiene
card9.content: Your dental hygiene, without doubt, begins with the usual brush and toothpaste, although it should not end here. Each person has a particular shape of denture and although for a few brushing is usually sufficient, most should use additional methods: dental floss, interdental brush, oral irrigator, mouthwashes... At Blancodent Dental Clinic we advise you to maintain adequate dental hygiene to prevent the appearance of tartar and bacterial plaque.
card9.alt: Drawing of a boy holding an enormous toothbrush about two metres long.

offers.title: Bite Splint Offer
offers.p1: 50% discount on semi-rigid bite splint + check-up + free X-ray.
offers.p2: Have you been wanting a healthier smile for a while?

card1.title: Professionalism
card1.content: Two decades of experience in Spain and Germany. Maximum dedication to the medical profession and its Blancodent Clinic.

card2.title: Hygiene
card2.content: Irrevocable compliance with the law. Both in the medical area and in the laboratory. Environmental respect for waste.

card3.title: Care
card3.content: The details that matter to understand each patient's needs. Patience, without economic discrimination...

card4.title: Materials
card4.content: From the best materials to the most economical, always manufactured in the European Community or Switzerland.

card5.title: Prices
card5.content: Clear information, competitive and respectful prices for each patient. Without misleading corporate advertising...

card6.title: Staff
card6.content: Dentists with Spanish and German qualifications. Auxiliary staff prepared, friendly and attentive to the patient. Family treatment.

Metadata.title: Blancodent Dental Clinic - Your dentists in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
Metadata.description: Dental clinic in Las Palmas, BLANCODENT. Dentists in Las Palmas. Dentists in Mesa y L贸pez. Experts in orthodontics, endodontics, bruxism treatment, periodontics, and dental implantology. You can find all dental specialties at BLANCODENT.
